Package io.spire.api

Interface Summary
Listener Implements this for having objects processing messages in the background i.e.
ResourceModelInterface Operations to be supported by Resource.ResourceModel
 

Class Summary
Account An account resource allows you to get information about your account, update it, or close it entirely.
Account.Origin CORS data
Api Encapsulates detailed information about the Spire Api resources.
Api.ApiDescriptionModel Describes the Spire Api description resource model obtained from Api.discover() This class knows how to parse the Api description resource
Api.ApiDescriptionModel.ApiResourceCollectionModel An Abstract Map representation of Api Resources
Api.ApiDescriptionModel.ApiResourceModel General representation of Api resource models since 1.0
Api.ApiDescriptionModel.ApiSchemaModel The schema resource provides a detailed schema for the spire media types.
Billing Spire Billing plans
Billing.Plan Describes features of a BillingSubscription
Billing.Plan.Features Billing plan features
Billing.Plan.Features.Queue Describes technical features of the service
BillingInvoice Describes the Account's billing invoice
BillingSubscription Describes the plan the Account is subscribe to
BillingSubscription.BillingInvoices A Collection of previous or upcoming invoices
Capability Describes a capability or a set of capabilities for a resource
Channel A channel resource allows you to get information about a channel, publish messages to a channel, or close (delete) a channel.
Channel.Channels Describes a Collection of channels The channels resources allows you to create new channels.
Events Describes events generated in Spire Channel
Message Internal representation of Spire Events
Message.MessageOptions Describes certain properties used for retrieving messages
Resource General abstraction of Api resources
Resource.ResourceModel Wrapper for the resource model internal data
Session A session object gives you access to privileged resources.
Subscription A subscription resources makes it easy to check messages on one or more channels
Subscription.Subscriptions Describes a Collection of Subscription The subscriptions resource allows you to create new subscriptions
 

Enum Summary
Message.MessageOptions.MessageOrderBy The chronological order in which messages are retrieve
